welcomeSection.title: Online Monitoring and Asset Management in One Place
welcomeSection.subTitle: Avoid failures in your machines and make downtime a thing of the past with TRACTIAN's predictive system.

predictiveMaintenance.title: Predictive Maintenance
predictiveMaintenance.text: Automatic fault detection, real-time asset health, reliability percentage and automatic insights.

onlineMonitoring.title: Online Monitoring
onlineMonitoring.text: Tractian sensor collects vibration, temperature, hour meter and energy consumption data in real time.

instantSetup.title: Instant Setup
instantSetup.text: Plug & Play solution, forget about gateways or routers, communication via independent 2G / 3G network.

integratedCMMS.title: Integrated CMMS
integratedCMMS.text: Automate processes, work orders, and have total control over your assets and staff.

plugPlaySensor.title: Advanced IoT technology to connect your assets
plugPlaySensor.text: Our sensors send data about your machine via a 3g / 4g network with no need of tons of gateways. Just attach the sensor to the location to be monitored and everything is ready: monitor the condition of your machine in real time.

onlineMonitoring.title: Platform working for you
onlineMonitoring.text: Automatic insights, mechanical backlash detection, misalignment, uncoupling, and Tractian's unique AI models for each type of machine.

assetManagement.title: Work Orders Automation
assetManagement.text: Use online procedures to organize checklists and inspections. Centralize your team's routine and leverage the activities of each employee through automation and metrics.
